word: BUT WHEN IT WAS DECIDED THAT GREAT CONTROVERSY, VOLUME IV SHOULD BE REPUBLISHED IN FORM FOR GENERAL CIRCULATION BY SUBSCRIPTION AGENTS, ELLEN G. WHITE SUGGESTED THAT THE PAGES BE LEFT OUT BECAUSE OF THE LIKELIHOOD THAT MINISTERS OF POPULAR CHURCHES READING THOSE STATEMENTS WOULD BECOME ANGERED AND WOULD ARRAY THEMSELVES AGAINST THE CIRCULATION OF THE BOOK.
